|description    = Commonly found within the "Scions of the Canopy," this wooden fencing exhibits a remarkably simple structure, constructed from "[[Ashen Aratiku Wood]]" and rope. Unlike conventional fencing, its distinctive feature lies in the metal rings on the wooden posts and the slack ropes strung across them. These metal rings serve as emergency hooks for rope attachments, providing support when necessary. The intentionally slack ropes offer a degree of cushioning or assistance in urgent situations, reducing the risk of injury. '''"Hanging Post of Coatepec Mountain"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].
The blueprint for "Hanging Post of Coatepec Mountain" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]]

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest near the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in {{Location|Phlogiston Extraction Research Center}}.
<gallery>
Item Hanging Post of Coatepec Mountain Location.png|Map location
Item Hanging Post of Coatepec Mountain Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Ashen Aratiku Wood = 6
|Iron Chunk = 2
|sort = Ashen Aratiku Wood;Iron Chunk
}}
